title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: Warp: S-spun linen. Wefts: S-spun linen, S-spun wool.
Technique: Warp-faced plain weave (20/cm x 9/cm) with slit tapestry and supplementary weft wrapping
description: Monochrome, purple wool pattern on undyed linen ground. Probably was a sleeve decoration. Bands of floral and geometric design. The tapestry area has 4+2 warp groupings with crossing and floating warps.
name: Fragment
